name: Camino Ad-Blocking
description: The built in ad-blocking style sheet from the Camino browser. It's really good. I'll make sure to update it with every stable release of Camino. Enjoy!
css:
/* This Source Code Form is subject to the terms of the Mozilla Public
 * License, v. 2.0. If a copy of the MPL was not distributed with this
 * file, You can obtain one at http://mozilla.org/MPL/2.0/. */

/*
 * CSS rules to hide various ad-related images and Flash files,
 * while avoiding too many false hits.
 * 
 * Based on CSS by Joe Francis at http://www.floppymoose.com.
 * 
 */

/* i really want this to be global */

{ display: none !important; -moz-binding: none !important }

@-moz-document domain(mail.google.com) {
div#rhc>div.rh,
div.slwyWc,
div.oM,
div.z0DeRc,
div[class="nH PS"] { display: none !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(wunderground.com) { 
div[style*="statefarm_bg.gif"][style*="width: 300px"] { display: none !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(facebook.com) {
div[class^="fbEmu"] { display: none !important }
}

/* turn some false positives back off */
a:link[href*="download."] img,
a:link[href*="mozilla.org"] img,
a:link[href*="netflix.com/addtoqueue"] img,
a:link[href*="click.mp3"] img,
a:link[href*="linksynergy.com"] img[src*="phobos.apple.com"],
a:link[id="AdBriteSkipThisAd"] img[src*=".adbrite.com"],
img[src*="wikipedia"],
img[src*="images.ucomics.com"],
img[src*="buttons.googlesyndication.com"],
iframe[src*="mozilla.org"],
div[id*="Player"] iframe[src*="/ads."]

{ display: inline !important }

div[class="content has_ad"] { display: block !important }

@-moz-document domain(wiki.caminobrowser.org) {
img[src*="/ad/"] { display: inline !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(apple.com) {
img[src*="/ads/"],
a:link[href*="ads."] img { display: inline !important }
div[id="ad"],
div[id$="-ad"] { display: block !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(nasdaq.com) {
div[id*="panel_content_ads"] { display: block !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(slatev.com) {
embed[type="application/x-shockwave-flash"][src*="slatev.com"] { display: inline !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(nationalgeographic.com) {
embed[type="application/x-shockwave-flash"][src*="adserver"] { display: inline !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(priceminister.com) {
a:link[href^="javascript"][href*="advert"] img { display: inline !important }
div[id="advert_list"] { display: block !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(mlb.com) {
div[id="tw_secnav_mc_ad"] { display: block !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(news.cnet.com) {
div[id="ads_backsplashSkin"] { display: block !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(lastfm.de) {
html embed[type="application/x-shockwave-flash"][width][height] { display: inline !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(macwelt.de) {
div[class*="advertisment"][id="spacer_58"] { display: block !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(gamespot.com) {
div[class*="swiff_container video_player"] { display: block !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(duesseldorf.de) {
div[class="nur_anzeige"] { display: block !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(petfinder.com) {
div[id="photo-ad"] { display: block !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(espn.go.com) {
div[class*="two_col_ad_in_rightcol"] { display: block !important }
}

@-moz-document domain(bloomberg.com) {
div[class="market_content_with_right_ad"] { display: block !important }
}
